did.unittitle: Miscellaneous - Tobacco - "The Cigarette Theory of Lung Cancer" by W.C. Hueper (1954); Two publications from the Tobacco Industry Research Committee (ca. 1954): The Research Program of the Scientific Advisory Board to the Tobacco Industry Research Committee and A Scientific Perspective on the Cigarette Controversy; Tobacco Markets and Conditions Abroad Circular No. 57 from the Tobacco Section of the U.S. Department of Commerce (1926)
